post:
MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the budget vps market since over a year now (globally). However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients :-)

The following plan is an offer from our newest location and technology; KVM in the UK.

**To get the double RAM, just open a ticket after ordering and you will get it :)**

> **512KVM (KVM)** England
512MB RAM Guaranteed - get it doubled to 1024MB for FREE!
20GB HD
500GB BW @ 100mb/s
1 ipv4
$7/month (originally $10)
Use Coupon: LET-X2YNDI0D5X
FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!)
Order: http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=50
Note: Limited stock, VPS is delivered with RescueCD by default, you have option to use KVMTemplates to reinstall, or provide us your own iso!

> **1024GIGDE (OpenVZ)** Germany 
1024MB RAM Guaranteed - get it doubled to 2048MB for FREE!
100GB HD - get it doubled to 200GB for FREE!
1000GB BW @ 1gb/s
1 ipv4
$7/month (originally $11)
Use Coupon: LET-GPI0NBEZ90
FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!)
Order: http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=39


> **1024VZCZ (OpenVZ)** Czech Republic

FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!)
Order: http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=55

**To get your free upgrades, please open a ticket after ordering, limited stock!**

R. Alkhaili
